description: Combines multiple exposure times from PamGene PS12 images.
name: ets.c06_groups_series_measurement2

factors.name: Measurement
factors.description:
Select the factor that defines the values to use in the computation.

Example:
* Median_SigmBg (default)

factors.name: Series
factors.description:
Select the factor which defines the sequence of images.

Example:
* Exposure Time (default)

factors.name: Variable
factors.description:
Select the peptide identifier.

Example:
* ID (default)

factors.name: Group
factors.description:
Select images for each cycle.

Multiple factors are required.

Example:
* Barcode,Row and Cycle (default)
* Barcode, Array and Cycle

filters.name: Measurement2
filters.description:
Select a filter to exclude saturated signal.

Example:
* Signal_Saturation (default)

description: Quality control of Tyrosine PamChip measurements.
name: ptkqc.c06_groups_series_measurement2

factors.name: Measurement
factors.description:
Select the factor that defines the values to use in the computation.

Example:
* S100

factors.name: Series
factors.description:
Select the factor that defines cycle. 
* Cycle (default)

factors.name: Variable
factors.description:
Select the peptide identifier.

Example:
* ID

factors.name: Group
factors.description:
Select the factor(s) defining a single value per cell.

Example:
* Barcode and Row (default)
* Barcode and Array

description: Quality control of Serine/Threonine PamChip measurements.

factors.name: Measurement

factors.name: Series
factors.description:

factors.name: Variable

factors.name: Group

description: Calculates the ratio (fold change) between a control and treatment condition.
name: fc.c07_super_2group_control_pair

factors.name: Measurement
factors.description:
Select the factor that defines the values to use in the computation.

Example:
* log transform of S100
* log transformed and ComBat Corrected S100
* VSN transformed S100
* VSN transformed and ComBat Corrected S100

factors.name: Variable
factors.description:
Select the peptide identifier.

Example:
* ID

factors.name: Supergroup
factors.description:
Select a factor that identifies the Supergroup. Supergroup(s) define each comparison group for which FC should be calculated. 

Example:
* Supergroup
* Replicate
* Cell line

factors.name: Group
factors.description:
Select the factor that defines the comparison groups.

Example:
* Test Condition
* Treatment off chip

factors.name: Pair
factors.description:
Select the factor that defines the pairing between observations. Pairing factor can NOT be the same as observation, such as Barcode + Row. 

Example:
* Replicate
* Barcode
* pair

filters.name: Group = control
filters.description:
Select the factor which defines the control.

Example:
* C-(DMSO, WT, Control)

description: Determines if there is a significant difference between the means of two groups.
name: ttest.c07_super_2group_control_pair

factors.name: Measurement

factors.description:

Example:

factors.name: Supergroup
factors.description:
Select a factor that identifies the Supergroup. Supergroup(s) define each comparison group for which t-tests should be calculated. Leave blank if there is only one comparison group. 

Example:
* Supergroup
* Cell line
* Genotype

factors.name: Observation
factors.description:
Select the factor(s) defining a single value per cell.

Example:
* Barcode and Row
* Barcode and Array
 * Sample Name
